languages.text: {n}В вашей {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}прошлой жизни{/d} способность определять, надежный ли перед вами человек или крыса, зачастую прокладывала границу между жизнью и смертью. Рядовой не искушен в искусстве лицедейства, и вы легко понимаете — парень не лапшит.{/n}

{n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В вашей {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}прошлой жизни{/d} способность определять, надежный ли перед вами человек или крыса, зачастую прокладывала границу между жизнью и смертью. Рядовой не искушен в искусстве лицедейства, и вы легко понимаете — парень не лапшит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In your former life, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}
{n}In your former life, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

{n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In deinem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}früheren Leben{/d} hat es oft den Unterschied zwischen Leben und Tod bedeutet, dass du einen Soldaten von einer Ratte unterscheiden konntest. Der Rekrut ist ein schlechter Schauspieler – du weißt, dass er nicht versucht, dich zu hintergehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In deinem früheren Leben hat es oft den Unterschied zwischen Leben und Tod bedeutet, dass du einen Soldaten von einer Ratte unterscheiden konntest. Der Rekrut ist ein schlechter Schauspieler – du weißt, dass er nicht versucht, dich zu hintergehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}précédente vie{/d}, vous vous êtes {mf|sorti|sortie} de bien des situations délicates en sachant flairer la traîtrise sur un soldat. Celui qui se tient devant vous est un piètre comédien ; vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il ne cherche pas à vous duper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans votre précédente vie, vous vous êtes {mf|sorti|sortie} de bien des situations délicates en sachant flairer la traîtrise sur un soldat. Celui qui se tient devant vous est un piètre comédien ; vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il ne cherche pas à vous duper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}之前的人生经历{/d}中，你一眼就能看出谁是好人，谁是叛徒，这样的能力曾将你从死亡线上拉回来好几次。这个二等兵根本不擅长演戏，你看得很清楚，他没有欺骗你的意图。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你之前的人生经历中，你一眼就能看出谁是好人，谁是叛徒，这样的能力曾将你从死亡线上拉回来好几次。这个二等兵根本不擅长演戏，你看得很清楚，他没有欺骗你的意图。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}これまでの人生{/d}で、兵士とスパイを見分ける能力は、生と死の境を意味していた。この兵卒は大根役者だ…彼はあなたを騙そうとしているのではないのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これまでの人生で、兵士とスパイを見分ける能力は、生と死の境を意味していた。この兵卒は大根役者だーー彼はあなたを騙そうとしているのではないのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}pasado{/d}, tu habilidad para distinguir a un solado de una sabandija solía marcar la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte. Sabes que el soldado no te está engañando, pues es un actor pésimo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En el pasado, tu habilidad para distinguir a un solado de una sabandija solía marcar la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte. Sabes que el soldado no te está engañando, pues es un actor pésimo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalleşi askerden ayırabilmen, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}önceki yaşantındaki{/d} pek çok vaziyette sağ kalıp kalamayacağını belirlemişti. Bu er, numara yapmakta çok kötü. Seni kandırmaya çalışmadığını biliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d}, your ability to tell a soldier from a rat often meant the difference between life and death. The private is a poor actor — you know he is not trying to trick you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalleşi askerden ayırabilmen, önceki yaşantındaki pek çok vaziyette sağ kalıp kalamayacağını belirlemişti. Bu er, numara yapmakta çok kötü. Seni kandırmaya çalışmadığını biliyorsun.{/n}
